alert.note: Alert for Borden; Dawson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:46AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Borden and northeastern Dawson Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 846 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamesa Municipal Airport, or near Lamesa, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public reported nickel size hail with this storm in Lamesa. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Los Ybanez, Punkin Center, Arvana, Hancock and Key. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
